scripts.build: npm run -s build:js && npm run -s build:css
scripts.build:js: echo Building JavaScript... && mkdirp dist && browserify src/main.js -o dist/bundle.js -t [ babelify ] && echo JavaScript built!
scripts.build:css: echo Building CSS... && mkdirp dist && cp style/style.css dist && echo CSS built!
scripts.build:test: echo Building tests... && mkdirp test/built && browserify test/main.js -o test/built/test.js -t [ babelify ] && echo Tests built!
